/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: value
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: The current value of component

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: autoFocus
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Sets focus to component when it's mounted

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: bodyCx
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: CSS class(es) to put on body-part component. See https://github.com/JedWatson/classnames#usage for details

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: cascadeSelection
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Controls how the selection (checking items) of a parent node affects the selection of its all children, and vice versa. - false: All nodes are selected independently (default). - true or 'explicit': Selecting a parent node explicitly selects all its children. Unchecking the last parent's child unchecks its parent. - 'implicit': Selecting a parent node means that all children are considered checked. The user sees all these nodes as checked on the UI, but only the selected parent is visible in the PickerInput tags, and only the checked parent is present in the Picker's value or DataSourceState.checked array. When the user unchecks the first child of such a parent, its parents become unchecked and all children but the unchecked one become checked, making children's selection explicit. If the last unchecked child gets checked, all children from the checked are removed, returning to the implicit state when only the parent is checked.

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: dataSource
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Provides items to the Picker

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: disableClear
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Disallow to clear Picker value (cross icon)

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.name: dropdownHeight
/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Overrides default height of the dropdown body

/app/src/docs/_props/epam-promo/componen.comment: Dropdown position relative to the input. See [Popper Docs](@link https://popper.js.org/)

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: cascadeSelection
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Controls how the selection (checking items) of a parent node affects the selection of its all children, and vice versa. - false: All nodes are selected independently (default). - true or 'explicit': Selecting a parent node explicitly selects all its children. Unchecking the last parent's child unchecks its parent. - 'implicit': Selecting a parent node means that all children are considered checked. The user sees all these nodes as checked on the UI, but only the selected parent is visible in the PickerInput tags, and only the checked parent is present in the Picker's value or DataSourceState.checked array. When the user unchecks the first child of such a parent, its parents become unchecked and all children but the unchecked one become checked, making children's selection explicit. If the last unchecked child gets checked, all children from the checked are removed, returning to the implicit state when only the parent is checked.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: dataSource
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Provides items to the Picker

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: disableClear
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Disallow to clear Picker value (cross icon)

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Overrides default height of the dropdown body

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Defines which value is to set on clear. E.g. you can put an empty array instead of null for empty multi-select Pickers

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Disables moving the dropdown body, when togglers is moved. Used in filters panel, to prevent filter selection to 'jump' after adding a filter.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Gets entity display name. Default it item.name.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: 'single' - only one item is selected. 'multi' - multiple items are selected

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: sortBy
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Defines how items should be sorted. By default, items are shown in order they are provided to the DataSource

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: sorting
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Defines sorting to pass to the DataSource

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: validationMessage
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Message describing why the value is invalid

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: validationProps
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: If T is a complex value (object or array), this property contains validation states of inner items

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: value
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: The current value of component

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: valueType
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Defines what to use in value/onValueChange: 'id' - item id (TId). 'entity' - the item itself (TItem)

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: cascadeSelection
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Controls how the selection (checking items) of a parent node affects the selection of its all children, and vice versa. - false: All nodes are selected independently (default). - true or 'explicit': Selecting a parent node explicitly selects all its children. Unchecking the last parent's child unchecks its parent. - 'implicit': Selecting a parent node means that all children are considered checked. The user sees all these nodes as checked on the UI, but only the selected parent is visible in the PickerInput tags, and only the checked parent is present in the Picker's value or DataSourceState.checked array. When the user unchecks the first child of such a parent, its parents become unchecked and all children but the unchecked one become checked, making children's selection explicit. If the last unchecked child gets checked, all children from the checked are removed, returning to the implicit state when only the parent is checked.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: dataSource
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Provides items to the Picker

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: defaultIds
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Ids of items to show first. If not specified, top props.maxDefaultItems will be shown according to the DataSource sorting settings (default is 10)

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: emptyValue
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Defines which value is to set on clear. E.g. you can put an empty array instead of null for empty multi-select Pickers

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: entityName
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Name of the entity being selected. Affects wording like "Please select [entity]"

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: entityPluralName
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Plural name of the entity being selected. Affects wording like "X [entities] selected"

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: filter
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Additional filter to apply to the DataSource. Can be used to limit selection somehow, w/o re-building the DataSource. E.g. in the linked pickers scenario.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: getName
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Gets entity display name. Default it item.name.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: getRowOptions
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Gets options for each row. Allow to make rows non-selectable, as well as many other tweaks.

/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.name: getSearchFields
/app/src/docs/_props/loveship/components.comment: Given an item, should return an array of string fields to search on. By default, the search is performed on item.name field.

/app/src/docs/_props/uui/components/pick.comment: CSS class(es) to put on body-part component. See https://github.com/JedWatson/classnames#usage for details

/app/src/docs/_props/uui/components/pick.name: cascadeSelection
/app/src/docs/_props/uui/components/pick.comment: Controls how the selection (checking items) of a parent node affects the selection of its all children, and vice versa. - false: All nodes are selected independently (default). - true or 'explicit': Selecting a parent node explicitly selects all its children. Unchecking the last parent's child unchecks its parent. - 'implicit': Selecting a parent node means that all children are considered checked. The user sees all these nodes as checked on the UI, but only the selected parent is visible in the PickerInput tags, and only the checked parent is present in the Picker's value or DataSourceState.checked array. When the user unchecks the first child of such a parent, its parents become unchecked and all children but the unchecked one become checked, making children's selection explicit. If the last unchecked child gets checked, all children from the checked are removed, returning to the implicit state when only the parent is checked.

/app/src/docs/_props/uui/components/pick.comment: Provides items to the Picker
